name: UKCoreBloodPressureDeviceType
title: UK Core Blood Pressure Device Type
description: A code from the SNOMED CT UK coding system for the type of device used to measure blood pressure. Selected from the SNOMED CT UK coding system: - 43770009 | Doppler device (physical object) - 469801002 | Invasive blood pressure monitor (physical object) - 258057004 | Non-invasive blood pressure monitor (physical object) - DescendantOrSelfOf 39690000 | Sphygmomanometer, device (physical object)

contains.display: Automatic-inflation electronic sphygmomanometer, portable, arm/wrist with pulse rhythm analyser
Noninvasive ankle brachial pressure index measurement unit
WatchBP Home A blood pressure measurement and pulse rhythm analysis device (Microlife)
